ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: Then roast him in the Blazing Fire.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Then cast him to be burnt in Hell;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: then cast him in the Fire,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: then throw them into hell to be heated up therein.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: “Then hurl him into the blazing fire.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Then throw him in the blazing Fire."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Then cast him into the burning fire,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: and then roast him in Hell,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And then expose him to hell-fire
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: and then let him enter Hell.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Then in the Scorch roast him
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: And burn ye him in the Blazing Fire.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Then throw him in the blazing Fire.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: Then scorch him in the Blaze.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [69:31] then admit him into Hell-fire, into the scorching Fire,
